name: Power of Martial Arts
description:
Finding the power in the way of martial arts...

A game made for the game jam Mini jam 73: Power

You can play it with mouse, pressing the four Image on the bottom, but I recommend to play using 

- Keyboard, key [z][x][c][v] ...

- Tapping on the screen of you smartphone...

I also recommend to test  the buttons before of starting... it is better you know "where to press" without watching, during the game there is no time to watch

the gameplay is just few minutes, I hope you enjoy it.

if you like the song I made for the game you can download it  [Creative Commons cc By-Sa]
